CLuaEmitter/Draw.description: Manually renders all particles the emitter has created.

CLuaEmitter/Finish.description: Removes the emitter and all its particles.

CLuaEmitter/GetNumActiveParticles.description: Returns the amount of active particles of this emitter.

CLuaEmitter/GetPos.description: Returns the position of this emitter. This is set when creating the emitter with

CLuaEmitter/Is3D.description: Returns whether this emitter is 3D or not. This is set when creating the emitter with

CLuaEmitter/SetBBox.description: Sets the bounding box for this emitter.

CLuaEmitter/SetNearClip.description: This function sets the the distance between the render camera and the emitter at which the particles should start fading and at which distance fade ends ( alpha becomes 0 ).

CLuaEmitter/SetNoDraw.description: Prevents all particles of the emitter from automatically drawing.

CLuaEmitter/SetParticleCullRadius.description: The function name has not much in common with its actual function, it applies a radius to every particles that affects the building of the bounding box, as it, usually is constructed by the particle that has the lowest x, y and z and the highest x, y and z, this function just adds/subtracts the radius and inflates the bounding box.

CLuaEmitter/SetPos.description: Sets the position of the particle emitter.
